author: USA TODAY, Editors, USA TODAY
title: Coronavirus rescue package, senior shopping hours, Grand Princess: 5 things to know Tuesday
description: Officials expect to finally agree on a coronavirus stimulus bill, Costco and other chains add senior shopping hours and more news you need to know Tuesday.
content:
Officials expected to agree on $2 trillion stimulus bill after late movement
Top congressional and White House officials emerged from negotiations late Monday over the $2 trillion coronavirus rescue package saying they expected to reach a deal Tuesday. Treas… [+5182 chars]
